So, first we'd like to know a little more about the system. Are you looking for some sort of web-based service, or a desktop application?

It's supposed to be a decentralized, distributed thing, nothing on a central server.

Essentially, it should check both at login and periodically to see if anything has changed, and if so, get the new information.
It's a continuous process.

Well, you should be able to define an arbitrary number of user permissions and give them all a variable set of abilities.

Essentially, the system will have a various set of things people can do.
